name: Dave Mirra Freestyle BMX
description:
Dave Mirra Freestyle BMX is a sports, racing and arcade game developed by Underground Development, Neon Studios and Z-Axis. It came out on 01-01-2000. It was published by Acclaim Entertainment. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play Dave Mirra Freestyle BMX on Dreamcast, PlayStation, Game Boy Color and PC.
